channel.title: Sijie Chen's Digital Garden
channel.description: Recent content on Sijie Chen's Digital Garden

item.description: Bio I’m a postdoc scholar from Department of Genetics, Stanford University, advised by Prof. Xiaojie Qiu. My research interests lie in understanding the cell state transitions and exploring how cells give rise to tissues. In particular, I am interested in developing machine learning methods for resolving spatiotemporal cell dynamics and building generative agents that integrate internal and external molecular and cellular interactions, with applications to in-silico mimicking and perturbating the organ developmental process.
